## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description | Type                                     | Default   |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `closable`  | `closable`  | Closable    | `boolean`                                | `true`    |
| `open`      | `open`      | Open state  | `boolean`                                | `false`   |
| `placement` | `placement` | Placement   | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'right'` |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size        | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl"`           | `'md'`    |
